title.en: Query a spline and write result to a variable

hint.en: Calculates the Y value of a given spline for a provided X value. The result is stored in a variable.

titleFormatted.en: Query [[spline]] at [[value]] and store it to [[variable]]

title.en: Spline - create a spline in the app config and select it here
Value - the 'X' value on the spline
